title: Fluffy and delicious pancakes
ingredients: ['180ml milk', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '125g plain flour', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, or as desired (optional)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract (optional)', 'cooking spray or sunflower oil, for greasing pan']
